contextId.information: This is an important title for God. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])
This is an important title for Jesus. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])
This is an important title that Jesus uses for God. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])
These are important titles that describe the relationship between God and Jesus. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])
This is an important title for God. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])
This is an important title for God. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])
This is an important title for God. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])
These are important titles that describe the relationship between God and Jesus. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])
The word "for" marks a comparison. The Son of God carries out judgment for God the Father. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])
contextId.quote: For the Father judges no one, but he has given all judgment to the Son

contextId.information: The voice of Jesus, the Son of God, will raise dead people from the grave. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])
contextId.quote: the dead will hear the voice of the Son of God, and those who hear will live

contextId.information: These are important titles that describe the relationship between Jesus and God. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])
contextId.quote: Son of Man ... God the Father

contextId.information: God the Father and God the Son will save forever those who believe in Jesus. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])
contextId.quote: Everyone whom the Father gives me will come to me

contextId.information: This is an important title for God. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])
This is an important title for God. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])
This is an important title for God. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])
This is an important title for God. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])
Jesus, the Son of God, has authority because of his special relationship with his Father. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])
contextId.quote: I am not alone, but I am with the Father who sent me

contextId.information: This is an important title for God. If your language must state whose Father this is, you could say "my Father" since Jesus switches to that in the following verses. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])
This is an important title for God. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])
"I am only saying what my Father taught me to say." The word "Father" is an important title for God. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])
contextId.quote: As the Father taught me, I speak these things

contextId.information: This is an important title for Jesus, the Son of God. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])

The word "Father" is an important title for God. No one knows God the Father like Jesus, the Son of God. AT: "it is my Father who honors me, and you say that he is your God."  (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])
contextId.quote: it is my Father who glorifies meâ€”about whom you say that he is your God

contextId.information: This is an important title for God. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])
"This is what my Father has commanded me to do." The word "Father" is an important title for God. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])
contextId.quote: I have received this command from my Father

contextId.information: The word "Father" is an important title for God. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])
contextId.quote: My Father, who has given them to me

contextId.information: Jesus performed the miracles by the power of God. The word "Father" is an important title for God. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])
contextId.quote: Jesus answered them, "I have shown you many good works from the Father

Jesus shares the love that God the Father has for him with those who trust in him. Here "Father" is an important title for God. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:guidelines_sonofgodprinciples]])
contextId.quote: As the Father has loved me, I have also loved you
